programme.title: I am a Jelly Doughnut
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke pays tribute to Robert Lochner and Alexander Butterfield.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines the roles Robert Lochner and Alexander Butterfield have played in American state affairs over the past four decades, including JF Kenndy's speech "Ich bin ein Berliner".
